brief.brief: This form displays an overview of the link record.
Since this is a general view, it does not display the individual links in their entirety. All fields in the individual link arrays are display only. You cannot update it from this screen.
Press Enter to redisplay the screen.

detail.detail: F1 (Add Link): Adds a new link record. Use this key to add the link record after entering all desired information. This key does not display for an existing link.

F2 (Update Link): Updates an existing link record. Use this key to save any changes you make to a link record. Service Manager only displays this key for existing links. If you have changed or added a link detail line using the F5 or F6 keys, you must still update the record to save the changes.
F3 (End): Returns you to the previous link maintenance screen, without updating the link record.
F4 (Delete Link): Deletes the link record. Service Manager only displays this key for existing links.
F5 (New Line): Opens a blank form where you may add a new individual link at the bottom of the arrays. The add line key adds a new line to the arrays; it does not update the record.

F6 (Edit Line): Opens a form for the individual link for editing. Before selecting this option, put your cursor on the source field array at the line you want to view. Even when updating the line, the arrays are updated, not the record.
F8 (Copy/Rename): Opens the link.copy screen, where you may rename or copy the link record.
F10 (Next): Takes you to the next link record in the list, without updating. Service Manager only displays this key when you have selected the link record from a search list.
F11 (Previous): Takes you to the prior link record in the list, without updating. Service Manager only displays this key when you have selected the link record from a search list.
F12 (Menu): Exits the link maintenance utility without updating.
